code: export const validateUserLoginForm=values=>{const errors={};if(!values.username){errors.username='Required';}else if(values.username.length<6){errors.username='Must be at least 6 characters.';}else if(values.username.length>15){errors.username='Must be 15 characters or less';}if(!values.password){errors.password='Required';}else if(values.password.length<8){errors.password='Must be at least 8 characters.';}return errors;};
